text: Under the Cherry Moon is a 1986 American romantic musical movie directed by Prince (who also stars) and stars Jerome Benton, Kristin Scott Thomas, Steven Berkoff, Francesca Annis. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and won 5 Razzies at the Golden Raspberry Awards in 1987. ==Other websites== * Category:1986 romance movies Category:1986 musical movies Category:American romance movies Category:American musical movies
title: Under the Cherry Moon
